name: Against Blocky Zombie Hordes
description:
Against Blocky Zombie Hordes is one of the best blocky zombie games in the category. If you are prepared to survivor and beat hordes and more hordes of undead zombies then this action-adventure game is for you. Get headshots, do missions in this wonderful 3d game (FPS 3d) open world. In this Edition FPS you can use multiple lock guns (from axes to sniper) and play with friends on incredible maps. Choose your weapon and start to wreak havoc and destruction blocky zombie.
Features:
- Become an Soldier at a Zombie Battlefield
- Immersive levels with Simple Blocky Graphics
- Zombies vs Enemies
- Jump right into the Action
- Weapon slots
